item.title: yesterday..
item.description: so yesterday I read two books. it was madness. I just needed that stimulation I guess.. first I read Angels & Demons by Dan Brown. It was pretty good. a very nice read. I felt that it was similar to those science/medical fiction books that are use a hihg base level of knowledge about the subject… the jargon I guess.. however Brown’s book is about catholicism, the vatican and such.. which makes it really fun to read - since I studied all of that crap in college.
